name: Ningguang
title: Lady of the Jade Chamber
description: The Tianquan of Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

normalattack.name: Sparkling Scatter
normalattack.description: Shoot gems to deal Geo DMG. Whenever they land 1 Star Jade floats around Ningguang. If she does a charged attack while multiple Star Jade are floating around her they deal a large amount of Geo DMG.

elementalskill.name: Jade Screen
elementalskill.description: Creates a Jade Screen that deals AoE Geo DMG and blocks enemy projectiles.

elementalburst.name: Starshatter
elementalburst.description: Launches rock projectiles at enemies and deals massive Geo DMG.

passivetalent2.name: Backup Plan
passivetalent2.description: When she has Star Jades, her Charged Attack does not consume Stamina.

passivetalent3.name: Strategic Reserve
passivetalent3.description: Characters that pass through the Jade Screen gain 12% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s.

constellations.d1: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.
constellations.d2:
When Jade Screen is shattered, its CD will reset. 
 Can occur once every 6s.
constellations.c3: Majesty be the Array of Stars
constellations.d3:
Increases the Level of Starshatter by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.c4: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All the Beneath
constellations.d4: Jade Screen increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.
constellations.d5:
Increase the Level of Jade Screen by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d6: When Starshatter is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.

profile.description: Owner of the Jade Chamber in the skies above Liyue, there are stories abound about Ningguang, with her elegance and mysterious smile. As a Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing, not only does she embody law and order, she also represents fortune and wit.
